metadata.Title: CVE-2023-32762 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Qt before 5.15.14, 6.x before 6.2.9, and 6.3.x through 6.5.x before 6.5.1. Qt Network incorrectly parses the strict-transport-security (HSTS) header, allowing unencrypted connections to be established, even when explicitly prohibited by the server. This happens if the case used for this header does not exactly match.

criterions.comment: qtbase-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
qtbase-opensource-src-gles: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
